docstring.long_description: The user controls the motor's rotation with the knob position, specified in the node's parameters.
docstring.short_description: Control a stepper motor's movement through a Polulu TIC driver.

parameters.name: default
parameters.description: The default value of the node, by default None

parameters.name: knob_value
parameters.description: Defines the position of the motor (rotational movement).

parameters.name: current_limit
parameters.description: Defines the current limitation that the stepper motor will receive.

parameters.name: sleep_time
parameters.description: Defines the sleep time after moving to each position.

parameters.name: speed
parameters.description: Defines the speed of the motor movement (between 0 and 200000).

videos.title: Control Tinymovr servo motor with Flojoy
